extendedInfo.description: Now you can view live video of your home or office on your tablet anywhere, anytime using a Wi-Fi or 3G connection. An elegant four camera monitoring dashboard lets you see and hear whatâs happening at home or office in real time, without being tied to a computer.You can also save snapshots to your tablet and quickly share with your friends and family. No more guessing whatâs happening while youâre at work or vacation, all you need is a mydlink-enabled camera and a tablet, and youâll always be connected to what matters most.For more information, go to mydlink.com or dlink.comFeatures:- Save snapshots to your tablets- Watch up to four cameras at a time: For multi-view, the focus camera provides live streaming, and other cameras provide snapshot- Switch cameras on-the-fly through the monitoring dashboard- Touch and drag to move your view around for non-PT cameras. Pinch to zoom in/out.- Toggle cameraâs view modes between Night mode, Day mode and Automatic mode.- After initial settings on the mydlink website, you can enable/disable motion/sound detection from the app for supported cameras. *supported cameras listed below in Notes.- SD Card Playback (for DCS-942L)- Remotely monitor and configure your Cloud Routers- Access and view your cameraâs video feed through your NVR.- You can talk back with 2-way audio support for supported cameras. **supported cameras listed below in Notes.Models compatible with mydlink+ v3.0.0:- Cloud Cameras: DCS-930L, DCS-931L, DCS-932L, DCS-933L, DCS-942L, DCS-1100, DCS-1100L, DCS-1130, DCS-1130L, DCS-2132L, DCS-2310L, DCS-2332L, DCS-5010L, DCS-5020L,DCS-5211L, DCS-5222L, DCS-5230L, DCS-6010L, DCS-7010L.- Cloud Routers: DAP-1160L, DAP-1360L, DIR-140L, DIR-600L, DIR-600LW, DIR-601L, DIR-602L, DIR-605L,DIR-605LW, DIR-615LB1, DIR-619L, DIR-626L, DIR-636L, DIR-640L, DIR-645L, DIR-808L, DIR-810L, DIR-820L, DIR-826L, DIR-836L, DIR-840L, DIR-845L, DIR-850L, DIR-855L, DIR-860L, DIR-865L, DIR-868L, DIR-900L, DIR-905L, DIR-919L, DSL-2770L, DSL-2870B, DSL-2890AL- NVR: DNR-322LRequires: Android 2.3 and upResolution support: 1920*1200 ; 1280*800; 1024*768; 1024*600Notes:*Support Motion/Sound Detection settings: DCS-931L, DCS-933L, DCS-5020L*Support Motion Detection settings only: DCS-942L, DCS-5010L, DCS-5211L, DCS-5222L**Support 2-way audio: DCS-942L, DCS-2132L, DCS-2310L, DCS-2332L, DCS-5211L, DCS-5222L, DCS-6010L, DCS-7010L

reviews.title: Two thumbs down!
reviews.comment: This app was 100 percent better before this update. Please fix this soon. It does not work with the Android Galaxy S-4 phones anymore.
reviews.author: YMarie Hill

reviews.title: Does not work anymore
reviews.comment: It worked great before the update. It\'s been a few weeks already and still no fix. Still does not work on the S4.
reviews.author: Tou Vang

reviews.title: Worse since update.
reviews.comment: This app got worse with the update. Please go back to the last version or refund.
reviews.author: Rick Walker

reviews.title: Unuseable after the update!
reviews.comment: I have to say that an update was overdue (like pinch to zoom, night mode, microphone, etc.), BUT not THIS! Completely unuseable on the HTC One: the layout is terrible, the live view area is microscopic and in the case of some cameras not visible at all! Hope it will be fixed! In the meantime the free version is much better!
reviews.author: Krisztian Kormendi

reviews.title: crashes almost every time
reviews.comment: After couple of recent updates, myDlink+ app crashes on the first starts.  I need to start it second time to get to the app with view of cameras.  Please fix it ASAP.  Also, the layout on my galaxy S4 is all screwed up; big text and small views of camera.  The free version (mydlink app) actually works better than paid version.
reviews.author: Andrew Sangho Lee

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: It works fine, but there is no point to buying this,. I thought I\'d be able to view multiple cameras LIVE at once, but you can only watch one at a time with a picture of the other one(s) from the last time you looked at it live... So what\'s the point?  Also crashes constantly, EVERY time i switch cameras
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I have been using MyDlink Lite without any problems.  I upgraded to the paid version for the improved features, but it  doesn\'t work at all.
reviews.author: Kelvin Heath

reviews.title: Arghh...!
reviews.comment: Update is horrible.  Loved it before. NEEDS FIXED..!!!
reviews.author: Kevin Fair

reviews.title: Slow. Not good as iphone app
reviews.comment: Slow. Not good as iphone app
reviews.author: HUNG NGUYEN

reviews.title: The update killed this app.
reviews.comment: I loved this app before the last update, now it is unworkable on my S4.
reviews.author: Shannon Provence

reviews.comment: Continuous crashing.  Not to bright to release this version yet
reviews.author: Buddy McClelland

reviews.comment: Still can\'t login. Says my login and/or pasword is wrong, but it is correct, so disappointed.
reviews.author: Stacie Blake

reviews.title: Hugely disappointing
reviews.comment: The app worked for 7 or 8 months and now it continiously says, cannot connect to server. Yet on my Ipad the app version there works perfectly. Not good at all Dlink!!!
reviews.author: Ragheb Mudarres

reviews.title: The free version works a lot better.
reviews.comment: This version does not stay connected and it not clear. Download the lite version until this version gets some much needed support.
reviews.author: Gary Staggers

reviews.title: Free is better than paid?
reviews.comment: I purchased the + version so I could have my cameras on one screen so far so good until I bought the dcs-5010L, the app says \"unknown\" but when I switched to the lite version I could even control the camera what\'s with that, please fix!!!
reviews.author: Vincent Alejandro

reviews.title: Good App - Add  Motion email option and fix initial logon screen
reviews.comment: Samsung S4: Good app but I wish that I could turn the motion detector, photo send option on/off via the app...right now I have to go to a computer to enable/disable this feature... ..it is better but you still cannot see the entire log on button and logon screen..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The free version connects better
reviews.comment: For whatever reason, when I cannot connect using the plus version, the free version always gets through.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worst piece of garbage ever created. Pity I paid for this garbage. It doesn\'t even find my cameras it just doesn\'t work.\tPure garbage!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: peter robinson

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: I hv no problem with the free app but for this paid spp, keep disconnecting every 1 min. Hv to reconnect again n again.
reviews.author: Aaron Choo

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
reviews.comment: Crashes constantly!!! Won\'t do full screen like lite app. Save your money and wait for better reviews if they ever fix this program.
reviews.author: A Google User
